item.title: 人工智能借贷如何成为美联储的难题
item.description: 目前，人工智能在资本支出融资中所占的份额越来越大。【原文：Artificial intelligence is now absorbing a bigger share of the financing for capital spending.】

item.title: 小心，奥斯卡奖。TikTok 大奖来了
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，亚历山德拉-莱文（Alexandra S. Levine）将报道 TikTok 为提高其创作者的知名度而举办的好莱坞式颁奖典礼。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Alexandra S. Levine reports on TikTok’s effort to raise the profile of its creators with a Hollywood-style awards show.】

item.title: 英国央行将利率下调至 3.75%，通胀预期减弱
item.description: 英国央行在圣诞节前将利率降至近三年来的最低点，这对英国家庭来说是一个利好消息，同时英国央行还表示通胀降温足以让其在 2026 年进一步放宽政策。【原文：The Bank of England cut interest rates to the lowest in almost three years in a pre-Christmas boost for UK households, and suggested inflation is cooling enough for it to ease policy further in 2026.】

item.title: 特斯拉的 "马斯克溢价 "成为关注焦点，SpaceX 首次公开募股在即
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克正在向投资者推销无人驾驶汽车、机器人助手和火星生活的未来。问题是，只有一种方法可以买到他的愿景：特斯拉公司的股票。【原文：Elon Musk is selling investors a future of driverless cars, robot assistants and life on Mars. The problem is there’s only one way to buy into his vision: Tesla Inc.’s stock.】

item.title: 受特朗普关税影响的美国小企业正被恐惧所吞噬
item.description: 美国 3600 万家小企业呼吁减免进口税【原文：The US’s 36 million small businesses are crying out for relief from import taxes】

item.title: 欧洲央行将维持利率不变
item.description: 法兰克福欧洲中央银行总部的欧元标志。摄影师KIRILL KUDRYAVTSEV/FP【原文：A Euro sign at the European Central Bank headquarters in Frankfurt. Photographer: KIRILL KUDRYAVTSEV/AFP】

item.title: 特朗普传媒将与 TAE 合并，建立核聚变业务
item.description: Trump Media & Technology Group Corp.和 TAE Technologies Inc. 同意以全股票交易的方式合并，交易价值超过 60 亿美元。【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. and TAE Technologies Inc. agreed to combine in an all-stock transaction valued at more than $6 billion.】

item.title: 瑞典和挪威经济前景不一，暂缓加息
item.description: 瑞典和挪威的中央银行都保持借贷成本稳定，因为两国官员都在评估本国经济的不同前景。【原文：Central banks in Sweden and Norway both kept borrowing costs steady as officials assess the disparate outlooks for their economies.】

item.title: 英国因巴基斯坦大亨拉哈尼在俄罗斯能源领域的作用而制裁他
item.description: 英国制裁了石油贸易大亨穆尔塔扎-拉哈尼（Murtaza Lakhani），这是针对俄罗斯对乌克兰发动战争的新方案的一部分。【原文：The UK sanctioned oil trading tycoon Murtaza Lakhani, part of a new package targeting Russia over its war against Ukraine.】

item.title: 德国启动基金吸引 1000 亿欧元私人资本
item.description: 德国政府启动了一项新的投资工具，旨在为能源基础设施、原材料、国防和初创企业吸引数百亿欧元的私人资本。【原文：Germany’s government kicked off a new investment vehicle intended to attract tens of billions of euros in private capital for energy infrastructure, raw materials, defense and startups.】

item.title: OpenAI 与高校签约，抢占教育市场先机
item.description: OpenAI 已经在美国许多大学建立了滩头阵地，克服了大学管理人员对人工智能的戒备心理，使 ChatGPT 在成为下一代工人的得力助手方面抢占了先机。【原文：OpenAI has established a beachhead at many US colleges, overcoming university administrators’ wariness of artificial intelligence and giving ChatGPT a headstart on becoming the go-to assistant for the next generation of workers.】

item.title: 如何交易期权
item.description:
在零售交易蓬勃发展的背景下，美国期权市场的交易量将连续第六年创下历史新高。【原文：

The US options market is heading for a sixth straight year of record volume amid a boom in retail trading.

】

item.title: 贝森特的 2025 年见证了鲍威尔和阿根廷的拯救以及对赤字的担忧
item.description: 从领导美国与中国的贸易谈判、为全球最大的债券市场指明方向，到安抚因唐纳德-特朗普总统最激进的经济声明而受到惊吓的投资者，斯科特-贝森特的 2025 年是忙碌的。【原文：From leading US trade negotiations with China and charting a course for the world’s biggest bond market to calming investors spooked by President Donald Trump’s most aggressive economic announcements, it’s been a busy 2025 for Scott Bessent.】

item.title: 阿波罗扩展资产级风险审查，以反映极端天气的影响
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is building out its risk review process to reflect the impact on asset valuations of extreme weather.】

item.title: 印度与阿曼签署贸易协定，新德里扩大中东地区影响力
item.description: 印度和阿曼签署了一项自由贸易协定，取消了主要商品的关税，并简化了市场准入手续，从而加强了新德里在中东地区扩大经济联系和战略存在的努力。【原文：India and Oman have sealed a free trade pact that removes tariffs on key goods and simplifies market access, bolstering New Delhi’s push to expand its economic ties and strategic presence in the Middle East.】

item.title: 一长串风险笼罩着 2026 年的股市
item.description:
人工智能预期、估值和利率都可能对明年的股市造成影响。【原文：

AI expectations, valuations, interest rates all could weigh on equities next year. 

】

item.title: 私人信贷的秘密交易武器是购买银行贷款
item.description: 通常情况下，私人信贷公司会与银行竞争，向公司推销一揽子债务计划，最后产生一个赢家。但随着竞争的激烈，直接贷款人创造了一种新的策略来抢夺交易。【原文：Typically, private credit firms go up against banks to pitch companies on a debt package and one winner emerges. But with competition fierce, direct lenders have created a new tactic to snag deals.】

item.title: 美国通胀报告公布前国债上涨
item.description: 在美国通胀报告公布之前，美国国债周四走高，政策制定者和投资者将从该报告中寻找明年货币政策前景的线索。【原文：US Treasuries edged higher on Thursday ahead of a US inflation report which policymakers and investors will be parsing for clues on the outlook for monetary policy next year.】

item.title: 战神公司斥资 7 亿美元收购弗吉尼亚州的人工智能企业
item.description: 战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp. ）正加大对人工智能热潮的押注，斥资 7 亿美元在弗吉尼亚州建造一座庞大的数据中心综合体，并购买已完全出租的房产。【原文：Ares Management Corp. is ramping up its bet on the AI boom, spending $700 million to build a sprawling data-center complex and buy fully-leased properties in Virginia.】

item.title: 摩根大通经济学家警告投机性股票 "极度拥挤
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co：今年大幅上涨的股票 "极度拥挤"。【原文：The latest bout of volatility in US equity markets highlights a risk that strategists at JPMorgan Chase & Co. have been warning about: “extreme crowding” in stocks that have rallied hard this year.】

item.title: 阿塞拜疆几十年来首次向亚美尼亚运送燃料
item.description: 阿塞拜疆向亚美尼亚发送了自苏联解体以来的第一批燃料货物，这是对这两个南高加索竞争对手在几十年冲突之后重新建立贸易联系的考验。【原文：Azerbaijan has dispatched its first fuel cargo to Armenia since the collapse of the Soviet Union, testing the reopening of trade links between the two South Caucasus rivals after decades of conflict.】

item.title: 尽管通胀加剧，墨西哥银行仍将再次削减开支：决定日指南
item.description: 尽管上个月墨西哥的通货膨胀率高于预期，但墨西哥央行可能会进行今年最后一次降息，以提振疲软的经济。【原文：Mexico’s central bank will likely deliver its last interest rate cut of the year in a bid to boost a sluggish economy despite faster-than-expected inflation last month.】

item.title: 泰国称柬埔寨边境之战也是一场打击骗子的战争
item.description: 泰国军队将其与柬埔寨的致命冲突改编成了一场打击网络犯罪分子的战斗，为越境轰炸行动增添了新的动机，称其目的是根除诈骗分子。【原文：Thailand’s army has recast its deadly clash with Cambodia as a battle against cybercriminals, adding a new motive for bombing runs across the border that it says are aimed at rooting out scammers.】

item.title: 吉尔吉斯斯坦通过债券销售计划和黄金代币加大市场推广力度
item.description: 吉尔吉斯斯坦有意加强其在国际市场上的影响力，继首次发行美元债券之后，又发行了更多债券，并推进了黄金支持的稳定币。【原文：Kyrgyzstan is intent on boosting its presence in international markets, following up on a debut dollar bond with more debt offerings and advancing a gold-backed stablecoin.】

item.title: 挪威利率维持在 4%，2026 年至少下调一次
item.description: 挪威央行在第二次会议上维持借贷成本不变，并表示不急于降低借贷成本。【原文：Norway’s central bank kept borrowing costs unchanged for a second meeting and said it’s in no rush to move lower.】

item.title: Ares 以私人贷款支持 BC Partners 收购 Fortidia
item.description: 据知情人士透露，战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp.【原文：Ares Management Corp. has provided a private credit package to back BC Partners’ purchase of Italian firm Fortidia, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 武田开发的人工智能牛皮癣药物在临床试验中获得成功
item.description: 武田药品株式会社宣布，其口服银屑病药物扎索西替尼在后期试验中证明是安全有效的，这标志着该公司治疗这种不治之症的努力取得了里程碑式的进展，并抵消了迫在眉睫的收入压力。【原文：Takeda Pharmaceutical Co. announced that its oral psoriasis drug zasocitinib proved safe and effective in late-stage trials, marking a milestone in its effort to treat the incurable skin condition and offset looming revenue pressure.】

item.title: 认识一下人工智能行业试图阻止的政治家
item.description:
所有目光都聚焦在纽约第 12 国会选区的竞选上。【原文：

All eyes are on the race for New York's 12th congressional district.

】

item.title: 德国扩大债务销售，创下 5120 亿欧元的历史纪录
item.description: 德国明年将把联邦债务销售额提高五分之一，达到创纪录的5120亿欧元（6010亿美元），以资助旨在修复其摇摇欲坠的基础设施和实现武装部队现代化的大笔支出。【原文：Germany will increase federal debt sales by a fifth next year to a record €512 billion ($601 billion) to fund a spending splurge aimed at fixing its crumbling infrastructure and modernizing its armed forces.】

item.title: 奇点：人工智能行业想要阻止的政治家（播客）
item.description: 奇点：人工智能行业想要阻止的政治家（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: The Politician the AI Industry Wants to Stop (Podcast)】
